QuestData.Title: Weed War II
QuestData.Description: Ssshhay... d'you know that guy over on the farm, with the... the *hic*... the weed problem? Gai Lan, I think his name was. I love that guy, man.$b$bAnywayshh, he said that if I *hic* sent an adventurer over to go pick his weeds, he'd get me some ale.$b$bIt's jusht a few weeds, not too many, probably.$b$b*hic*
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Gai Lan, then pick 100 Weeds on his farm. You can pick Weeds while mounted.
